suncertify.client
Class ClientModel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
        |
        +--suncertify.client.ClientModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class ClientModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel

This class implements AbstractTableModel and holds all the data needed by the GUI.

See Also:

setSearchConditions

public void setSearchConditions(java.lang.String str)
                         throws DatabaseException
Search the database by using the search condition parameter. If the paramter is null or "", the function will return all records in the database. Otherwise it will return the records exactly meet the search condition.
Parameters:
str - The search conditions.
Throws:
DatabaseException - Thrown when database file could not be accessed.

getSearchConditions

public java.lang.String getSearchConditions()
Get the current search conditions
Returns:
String The current search conditions.

closeDB

public void closeDB()
Close Database. In local database condition, it will close the db.db file. In network database condtion, it will close the connection to the database.
